1.2px; font-weight: normal; font-style: normal;"><a href=3D"https://en.wiki=
pedia.org/wiki/World_Wide_Web#cite_note-58" style=3D"text-decoration: none;=
 color: #0b0080; white-space: nowrap; background: none;" target=3D"_blank">=
<span>[</span>58<span>]</span></a></sup><br data-mce-bogus=3D"1"></p><h2 st=
yle=3D"color: black; font-weight: normal; margin: 1em 0px 0.25em; overflow:=
 hidden; padding: 0px; border-bottom-width: 1px; border-bottom-style: solid=
; border-bottom-color: #aaaaaa; font-size: 1.5em; font-family: 'Linux Liber=
tine', Georgia, Times, serif; line-height: 1.3; background: none;"><span cl=
ass=3D"mw-headline" id=3D"Privacy">Privacy</span><span class=3D"mw-editsect=
ion" style=3D"-webkit-user-select: none; font-size: small; font-weight: nor=
mal; margin-left: 1em; vertical-align: baseline; line-height: 1em; display:=
 inline-block; white-space: nowrap; unicode-bidi: isolate; font-family: san=
s-serif;"><span class=3D"mw-editsection-bracket" style=3D"margin-right: 0.2=
5em; color: #555555;">[</span><a href=3D"https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.p=
hp?title=3DWorld_Wide_Web&amp;action=3Dedit&amp;section=3D8" title=3D"Edit =
section: Privacy" style=3D"text-decoration: none; color: #0b0080; backgroun=
d: none;" target=3D"_blank">edit</a><span class=3D"mw-editsection-bracket" =
style=3D"margin-left: 0.25em; color: #555555;">]</span></span></h2><div cla=
ss=3D"hatnote relarticle mainarticle" style=3D"font-style: italic; padding-=
left: 1.6em; margin-bottom: 0.5em;">Main article:<span class=3D"Apple-conve=
rted-space">&nbsp;</span><a href=3D"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Internet_=
privacy" title=3D"Internet privacy" style=3D"text-decoration: none; color: =
#0b0080; background: none;" target=3D"_blank">Internet privacy</a><br data-=
mce-bogus=3D"1"></div><p style=3D"margin: 0px; line-height: inherit;">Every=
 time a client requests a web page, the server can identify the request's I=
P address and usually logs it. Also, unless set not to do so, most web brow=
sers record requested web pages in a viewable<span class=3D"Apple-converted=
-space">&nbsp;</span><i>history</i>feature, and usually<span class=3D"Apple=
-converted-space">&nbsp;</span><a href=3D"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Web=
_cache" title=3D"Web cache" style=3D"text-decoration: none; color: #0b0080;=
 background: none;" target=3D"_blank">cache</a><span class=3D"Apple-convert=
ed-space">&nbsp;</span>much of the content locally. Unless the server-brows=
er communication uses HTTPS encryption, web requests and responses travel i=
n plain text across the Internet and can be viewed, recorded, and cached by=
 intermediate systems.</p><p style=3D"margin: 0px; line-height: inherit;">W=
hen a web page asks for, and the user supplies,<span class=3D"Apple-convert=
ed-space">&nbsp;</span><a href=3D"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Personally_=
identifiable_information" title=3D"Personally identifiable information" sty=
le=3D"text-decoration: none; color: #0b0080; background: none;" target=3D"_=
blank">personally identifiable information</a>=E2=80=94such as their real n=
ame, address, e-mail address, etc.=E2=80=94web-based entities can associate=
 current web traffic with that individual. If the website uses<span class=
=3D"Apple-converted-space">&nbsp;</span><a href=3D"https://en.wikipedia.org=
/wiki/HTTP_cookie" title=3D"HTTP cookie" style=3D"text-decoration: none; co=
lor: #0b0080; background: none;" target=3D"_blank">HTTP cookies</a>, userna=
me and password authentication, or other tracking techniques, it can relate=
 other web visits, before and after, to the identifiable information provid=
ed. In this way it is possible for a web-based organisation to develop and =
build a profile of the individual people who use its site or sites. It may =
be able to build a record for an individual that includes information about=
 their leisure activities, their shopping interests, their profession, and =
other aspects of their<span class=3D"Apple-converted-space">&nbsp;</span><a=
 href=3D"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Demographic_profile" title=3D"Demogr=
aphic profile" style=3D"text-decoration: none; color: #0b0080; background: =
none;" target=3D"_blank">demographic profile</a>. These profiles are obviou=
sly of potential interest to marketeers, advertisers and others. Depending =
on the website's<span class=3D"Apple-converted-space">&nbsp;</span><a href=
=3D"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Terms_and_conditions" title=3D"Terms and =
conditions" class=3D"mw-redirect" style=3D"text-decoration: none; color: #0=
b0080; background: none;" target=3D"_blank">terms and conditions</a><span c=
lass=3D"Apple-converted-space">&nbsp;</span>and the local laws that apply i=
nformation from these profiles may be sold, shared, or passed to other orga=
nisations without the user being informed. For many ordinary people, this m=
eans little more than some unexpected e-mails in their in-box, or some unca=
nnily relevant advertising on a future web page. For others, it can mean th=
at time spent indulging an unusual interest can result in a deluge of furth=
er targeted marketing that may be unwelcome. Law enforcement, counter terro=
rism and espionage agencies can also identify, target and track individuals=
 based on their interests or proclivities on the Web.</p><p style=3D"margin=
: 0px; line-height: inherit;"><a href=3D"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Soci=
al_networking" title=3D"Social networking" class=3D"mw-redirect" style=3D"t=
ext-decoration: none; color: #0b0080; background: none;" target=3D"_blank">=
Social networking</a><span class=3D"Apple-converted-space">&nbsp;</span>sit=
es try to get users to use their real names, interests, and locations. They=
 believe this makes the social networking experience more realistic, and th=
erefore more engaging for all their users. On the other hand, uploaded phot=
ographs or unguarded statements can be identified to an individual, who may=
 regret this exposure. Employers, schools, parents, and other relatives may=
 be influenced by aspects of social networking profiles that the posting in=
dividual did not intend for these audiences.<span class=3D"Apple-converted-=
space">&nbsp;</span><a href=3D"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cyberbullying"=
 title=3D"Cyberbullying" style=3D"text-decoration: none; color: #0b0080; ba=
ckground: none;" target=3D"_blank">On-line bullies</a><span class=3D"Apple-=
converted-space">&nbsp;</span>may make use of personal information to haras=
s or<span class=3D"Apple-converted-space">&nbsp;</span><a href=3D"https://e=
n.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cyberstalking" title=3D"Cyberstalking" style=3D"text-d=
ecoration: none; color: #0b0080; background: none;" target=3D"_blank">stalk=
</a><span class=3D"Apple-converted-space">&nbsp;</span>users. Modern social=
 networking websites allow fine grained control of the privacy settings for=
 each individual posting, but these can be complex and not easy to find or =
use, especially for beginners.<sup id=3D"cite_ref-59" class=3D"reference" s=
tyle=3D"line-height: 1; unicode-bidi: isolate; font-size: 11.2px; font-weig=
ht: normal; font-style: normal;"><a href=3D"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/W=
orld_Wide_Web#cite_note-59" style=3D"text-decoration: none; color: #0b0080;=
 white-space: nowrap; background: none;" target=3D"_blank"><span>[</span>59=
<span>]</span></a></sup><br data-mce-bogus=3D"1"></p><p style=3D"margin: 0p=
x; line-height: inherit;">Photographs and videos posted onto websites have =
caused particular problems, as they can add a person's face to an on-line p=
rofile. With modern and potential<span class=3D"Apple-converted-space">&nbs=
p;</span><a href=3D"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Facial_recognition_system=
" title=3D"Facial recognition system" style=3D"text-decoration: none; color=
: #0b0080; background: none;" target=3D"_blank">facial recognition technolo=
gy</a>, it may then be possible to relate that face with other, previously =
anonymous, images, events and scenarios that have been imaged elsewhere. Be=
cause of image caching, mirroring and copying, it is difficult to remove an=
 image from the World Wide Web.</p><h2 style=3D"color: black; font-weight: =
normal; margin: 1em 0px 0.25em; overflow: hidden; padding: 0px; border-bott=
om-width: 1px; border-bottom-style: solid; border-bottom-color: #aaaaaa; fo=
nt-size: 1.5em; font-family: 'Linux Libertine', Georgia, Times, serif; line=
-height: 1.3; background: none;"><span class=3D"mw-headline" id=3D"Standard=
s">Standards</span><span class=3D"mw-editsection" style=3D"-webkit-user-sel=
ect: none; font-size: small; font-weight: normal; margin-left: 1em; vertica=
l-align: baseline; line-height: 1em; display: inline-block; white-space: no=
wrap; unicode-bidi: isolate; font-family: sans-serif;"><span class=3D"mw-ed=
itsection-bracket" style=3D"margin-right: 0.25em; color: #555555;">[</span>=
<a href=3D"https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=3DWorld_Wide_Web&amp;=
action=3Dedit&amp;section=3D9" title=3D"Edit section: Standards" style=3D"t=
ext-decoration: none; color: #0b0080; background: none;" target=3D"_blank">=
edit</a><span class=3D"mw-editsection-bracket" style=3D"margin-left: 0.25em=
; color: #555555;">]</span></span></h2><div class=3D"hatnote relarticle mai=
narticle" style=3D"font-style: italic; padding-left: 1.6em; margin-bottom: =
0.5em;">Main article:<span class=3D"Apple-converted-space">&nbsp;</span><a =
href=3D"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Web_standards" title=3D"Web standards=
" style=3D"text-decoration: none; color: #0b0080; background: none;" target=
=3D"_blank">Web standards</a><br data-mce-bogus=3D"1"></div><p style=3D"mar=
gin: 0px; line-height: inherit;">Many formal standards and other technical =
specifications and software define the operation of different aspects of th=
e World Wide Web, the Internet, and computer information exchange. Many of =
the documents are the work of the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C), headed b=
y Berners-Lee, but some are produced by the<span class=3D"Apple-converted-s=
pace">&nbsp;</span><a href=3D"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Internet_Engine=
ering_Task_Force" title=3D"Internet Engineering Task Force" style=3D"text-d=
ecoration: none; color: #0b0080; background: none;" target=3D"_blank">Inter=
net Engineering Task Force</a><span class=3D"Apple-converted-space">&nbsp;<=
/span>(IETF) and other organizations.</p><p style=3D"margin: 0px; line-heig=
ht: inherit;">Usually, when web standards are discussed, the following publ=
ications are seen as foundational:</p><ul style=3D"list-style-type: disc; m=
argin: 0.3em 0px 0px 1.6em; padding: 0px;"><li style=3D"margin-bottom: 0.1e=
m;">Recommendations for<span class=3D"Apple-converted-space">&nbsp;</span><=
a href=3D"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Markup_languages" title=3D"Markup l=
anguages" class=3D"mw-redirect" style=3D"text-decoration: none; color: #0b0=
080; background: none;" target=3D"_blank">markup languages</a>, especially<=
span class=3D"Apple-converted-space">&nbsp;</span><a href=3D"https://en.wik=
ipedia.org/wiki/HTML" title=3D"HTML" style=3D"text-decoration: none; color:=
 #0b0080; background: none;" target=3D"_blank">HTML</a><span class=3D"Apple=
-converted-space">&nbsp;</span>and<span class=3D"Apple-converted-space">&nb=
sp;</span><a href=3D"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/XHTML" title=3D"XHTML" s=
tyle=3D"text-decoration: none; color: #0b0080; background: none;" target=3D=
"_blank">XHTML</a>, from the W3C. These define the structure and interpreta=
tion of hypertext documents.</li><li style=3D"margin-bottom: 0.1em;">Recomm=
endations for<span class=3D"Apple-converted-space">&nbsp;</span><a href=3D"=
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Style_sheet_(web_development)" title=3D"Style=
 sheet (web development)" style=3D"text-decoration: none; color: #0b0080; b=
ackground: none;" target=3D"_blank">stylesheets</a>, especially<span class=
=3D"Apple-converted-space">&nbsp;</span><a href=3D"https://en.wikipedia.org=
/wiki/Cascading_Style_Sheets" title=3D"Cascading Style Sheets" style=3D"tex=
t-decoration: none; color: #0b0080; background: none;" target=3D"_blank">CS=
S</a>, from the W3C.</li><li style=3D"margin-bottom: 0.1em;">Standards for =
ECMAScript (usually in the form of JavaScript), from<span class=3D"Apple-co=
nverted-space">&nbsp;</span><a href=3D"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ecma_I=
nternational" title=3D"Ecma International" style=3D"text-decoration: none; =
color: #0b0080; background: none;" target=3D"_blank">Ecma International</a>=
.</li><li style=3D"margin-bottom: 0.1em;">Recommendations for the<span clas=
s=3D"Apple-converted-space">&nbsp;</span><a href=3D"https://en.wikipedia.or=
g/wiki/Document_Object_Model" title=3D"Document Object Model" style=3D"text=
-decoration: none; color: #0b0080; background: none;" target=3D"_blank">Doc=
ument Object Model</a>, from W3C.</li></ul><p style=3D"margin: 0px; line-he=
ight: inherit;">Additional publications provide definitions of other essent=
ial technologies for the World Wide Web, including, but not limited to, the=
 following:</p><ul style=3D"list-style-type: disc; margin: 0.3em 0px 0px 1.=
6em; padding: 0px;"><li style=3D"margin-bottom: 0.1em;"><i>Uniform Resource=
 Identifier</i><span class=3D"Apple-converted-space">&nbsp;</span>(URI), wh=
ich is a universal system for referencing resources on the Internet, such a=
s hypertext documents and images. URIs, often called URLs, are defined by t=
he IETF's<span class=3D"Apple-converted-space">&nbsp;</span><a class=3D"ext=
ernal mw-magiclink-rfc" rel=3D"nofollow" href=3D"https://tools.ietf.org/htm=
l/rfc3986" style=3D"text-decoration: none; color: #663366; padding-right: 1=
3px; background:  100% 50% no-repeat,  100% 50%;" target=3D"_blank">RFC 398=
6</a>/ STD 66:<span class=3D"Apple-converted-space">&nbsp;</span><i>Uniform=
 Resource Identifier (URI): Generic Syntax</i>, as well as its predecessors=
 and numerous<span class=3D"Apple-converted-space">&nbsp;</span><a href=3D"=
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/URI_scheme" title=3D"URI scheme" class=3D"mw-=
redirect" style=3D"text-decoration: none; color: #0b0080; background: none;=
" target=3D"_blank">URI scheme</a>-defining<span class=3D"Apple-converted-s=
pace">&nbsp;</span><a href=3D"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Request_For_Com=
ments" title=3D"Request For Comments" class=3D"mw-redirect" style=3D"text-d=
ecoration: none; color: #0b0080; background: none;" target=3D"_blank">RFCs<=
/a>;</li><li style=3D"margin-bottom: 0.1em;"><i>HyperText Transfer Protocol=
 (HTTP)</i>, especially as defined by<span class=3D"Apple-converted-space">=
&nbsp;</span><a class=3D"external mw-magiclink-rfc" rel=3D"nofollow" href=
=3D"https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc2616" style=3D"text-decoration: none; co=
lor: #663366; padding-right: 13px; background:  100% 50% no-repeat,  100% 5=
0%;" target=3D"_blank">RFC 2616</a>:<span class=3D"Apple-converted-space">&=
nbsp;</span><i>HTTP/1.1</i><span class=3D"Apple-converted-space">&nbsp;</sp=
an>and<span class=3D"Apple-converted-space">&nbsp;</span><a class=3D"extern=
al mw-magiclink-rfc" rel=3D"nofollow" href=3D"https://tools.ietf.org/html/r=
fc2617" style=3D"text-decoration: none; color: #663366; padding-right: 13px=
; background:  100% 50% no-repeat,  100% 50%;" target=3D"_blank">RFC 2617</=
a>:<span class=3D"Apple-converted-space">&nbsp;</span><i>HTTP Authenticatio=
n</i>, which specify how the browser and server authenticate each other.</l=
i></ul><h2 style=3D"color: black; font-weight: normal; margin: 1em 0px 0.25=
em; overflow: hidden; padding: 0px; border-bottom-width: 1px; border-bottom=
-style: solid; border-bottom-color: #aaaaaa; font-size: 1.5em; font-family:=
 'Linux Libertine', Georgia, Times, serif; line-height: 1.3; background: no=
ne;"><span class=3D"mw-headline" id=3D"Accessibility">Accessibility</span><=
span class=3D"mw-editsection" style=3D"-webkit-user-select: none; font-size=
: small; font-weight: normal; margin-left: 1em; vertical-align: baseline; l=
ine-height: 1em; display: inline-block; white-space: nowrap; unicode-bidi: =
isolate; font-family: sans-serif;"><span class=3D"mw-editsection-bracket" s=
tyle=3D"margin-right: 0.25em; color: #555555;">[</span><a href=3D"https://e=
n.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=3DWorld_Wide_Web&amp;action=3Dedit&amp;se=
ction=3D10" title=3D"Edit section: Accessibility" style=3D"text-decoration:=
 none; color: #0b0080; background: none;" target=3D"_blank">edit</a><span c=
lass=3D"mw-editsection-bracket" style=3D"margin-left: 0.25em; color: #55555=
5;">]</span></span></h2><div class=3D"hatnote relarticle mainarticle" style=
=3D"font-style: italic; padding-left: 1.6em; margin-bottom: 0.5em;">Main ar=
ticle:<span class=3D"Apple-converted-space">&nbsp;</span><a href=3D"https:/=
/en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Web_accessibility" title=3D"Web accessibility" style=
=3D"text-decoration: none; color: #0b0080; background: none;" target=3D"_bl=
ank">Web accessibility</a><br data-mce-bogus=3D"1"></div><p style=3D"margin=
: 0px; line-height: inherit;">There are methods for accessing the Web in al=
ternative mediums and formats to facilitate use by individuals with disabil=
ities. These disabilities may be visual, auditory, physical, speech related=
, cognitive, neurological, or some combination. Accessibility features also=
 help people with temporary disabilities, like a broken arm, or aging users=
 as their abilities change.<sup id=3D"cite_ref-WAI_60-0" class=3D"reference=
" style=3D"line-height: 1; unicode-bidi: isolate; font-size: 11.2px; font-w=
eight: normal; font-style: normal;"><a href=3D"https://en.wikipedia.org/wik=
i/World_Wide_Web#cite_note-WAI-60" style=3D"text-decoration: none; color: #=
0b0080; white-space: nowrap; background: none;" target=3D"_blank"><span>[</=
span>60<span>]</span></a></sup><span class=3D"Apple-converted-space">&nbsp;=
</span>The Web receives information as well as providing information and in=
teracting with society. The World Wide Web Consortium claims it essential t=
hat the Web be accessible, so it can provide equal access and<span class=3D=
"Apple-converted-space">&nbsp;</span><a href=3D"https://en.wikipedia.org/wi=
ki/Equal_opportunity" title=3D"Equal opportunity" style=3D"text-decoration:=
 none; color: #0b0080; background: none;" target=3D"_blank">equal opportuni=
ty</a><span class=3D"Apple-converted-space">&nbsp;</span>to people with dis=
abilities.<sup id=3D"cite_ref-61" class=3D"reference" style=3D"line-height:=
 1; unicode-bidi: isolate; font-size: 11.2px; font-weight: normal; font-sty=
le: normal;"><a href=3D"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/World_Wide_Web#cite_n=
ote-61" style=3D"text-decoration: none; color: #0b0080; white-space: nowrap=
; background: none;" target=3D"_blank"><span>[</span>61<span>]</span></a></=
sup><span class=3D"Apple-converted-space">&nbsp;</span>Tim Berners-Lee once=
 noted, "The power of the Web is in its universality. Access by everyone re=
gardless of disability is an essential aspect."<sup id=3D"cite_ref-WAI_60-1=
" class=3D"reference" style=3D"line-height: 1; unicode-bidi: isolate; font-=
size: 11.2px; font-weight: normal; font-style: normal;"><a href=3D"https://=
en.wikipedia.org/wiki/World_Wide_Web#cite_note-WAI-60" style=3D"text-decora=
tion: none; color: #0b0080; white-space: nowrap; background: none;" target=
=3D"_blank"><span>[</span>60<span>]</span></a></sup><span class=3D"Apple-co=
nverted-space">&nbsp;</span>Many countries regulate<span class=3D"Apple-con=
verted-space">&nbsp;</span><a href=3D"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Web_acc=
essibility" title=3D"Web accessibility" style=3D"text-decoration: none; col=
or: #0b0080; background: none;" target=3D"_blank">web accessibility</a><spa=
n class=3D"Apple-converted-space">&nbsp;</span>as a requirement for website=
s.<sup id=3D"cite_ref-62" class=3D"reference" style=3D"line-height: 1; unic=
ode-bidi: isolate; font-size: 11.2px; font-weight: normal; font-style: norm=
al;"><a href=3D"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/World_Wide_Web#cite_note-62" =
style=3D"text-decoration: none; color: #0b0080; white-space: nowrap; backgr=
ound: none;" target=3D"_blank"><span>[</span>62<span>]</span></a></sup>Inte=
rnational cooperation in the W3C<span class=3D"Apple-converted-space">&nbsp=
;</span><a href=3D"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Web_Accessibility_Initiati=
ve" title=3D"Web Accessibility Initiative" style=3D"text-decoration: none; =
color: #0b0080; background: none;" target=3D"_blank">Web Accessibility Init=
iative</a><span class=3D"Apple-converted-space">&nbsp;</span>led to simple =
guidelines that web content authors as well as software developers can use =
to make the Web accessible to persons who may or may not be using<span clas=
s=3D"Apple-converted-space">&nbsp;</span><a href=3D"https://en.wikipedia.or=
g/wiki/Assistive_technology" title=3D"Assistive technology" style=3D"text-d=
ecoration: none; color: #0b0080; background: none;" target=3D"_blank">assis=
tive technology</a>.<sup id=3D"cite_ref-WAI_60-2" class=3D"reference" style=
=3D"line-height: 1; unicode-bidi: isolate; font-size: 11.2px; font-weight: =
normal; font-style: normal;"><a href=3D"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/World=
_Wide_Web#cite_note-WAI-60" style=3D"text-decoration: none; color: #0b0080;=
 white-space: nowrap; background: none;" target=3D"_blank"><span>[</span>60=
<span>]</span></a></sup><sup id=3D"cite_ref-63" class=3D"reference" style=
=3D"line-height: 1; unicode-bidi: isolate; font-size: 11.2px; font-weight: =
normal; font-style: normal;"><a href=3D"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/World=
_Wide_Web#cite_note-63" style=3D"text-decoration: none; color: #0b0080; whi=
te-space: nowrap; background: none;" target=3D"_blank"><span>[</span>63<spa=
n>]</span></a></sup><br data-mce-bogus=3D"1"></p><h2 style=3D"color: black;=
 font-weight: normal; margin: 1em 0px 0.25em; overflow: hidden; padding: 0p=
x; border-bottom-width: 1px; border-bottom-style: solid; border-bottom-colo=
r: #aaaaaa; font-size: 1.5em; font-family: 'Linux Libertine', Georgia, Time=
s, serif; line-height: 1.3; background: none;"><span class=3D"mw-headline" =
id=3D"Internationalization">Internationalization</span><span class=3D"mw-ed=
itsection" style=3D"-webkit-user-select: none; font-size: small; font-weigh=
t: normal; margin-left: 1em; vertical-align: baseline; line-height: 1em; di=
splay: inline-block; white-space: nowrap; unicode-bidi: isolate; font-famil=
y: sans-serif;"><span class=3D"mw-editsection-bracket" style=3D"margin-righ=
t: 0.25em; color: #555555;">[</span><a href=3D"https://en.wikipedia.org/w/i=
ndex.php?title=3DWorld_Wide_Web&amp;action=3Dedit&amp;section=3D11" title=
=3D"Edit section: Internationalization" style=3D"text-decoration: none; col=
or: #0b0080; background: none;" target=3D"_blank">edit</a><span class=3D"mw=
-editsection-bracket" style=3D"margin-left: 0.25em; color: #555555;">]</spa=
n></span></h2><p style=3D"margin: 0px; line-height: inherit;">The W3C<span =
class=3D"Apple-converted-space">&nbsp;</span><a href=3D"https://en.wikipedi=
a.org/wiki/Internationalization_and_localization" title=3D"Internationaliza=
tion and localization" style=3D"text-decoration: none; color: #0b0080; back=
ground: none;" target=3D"_blank">Internationalization</a><span class=3D"App=
le-converted-space">&nbsp;</span>Activity assures that web technology works=
 in all languages, scripts, and cultures.<sup id=3D"cite_ref-64" class=3D"r=
eference" style=3D"line-height: 1; unicode-bidi: isolate; font-size: 11.2px=
; font-weight: normal; font-style: normal;"><a href=3D"https://en.wikipedia=
.org/wiki/World_Wide_Web#cite_note-64" style=3D"text-decoration: none; colo=
r: #0b0080; white-space: nowrap; background: none;" target=3D"_blank"><span=
>[</span>64<span>]</span></a></sup><span class=3D"Apple-converted-space">&n=
bsp;</span>Beginning in 2004 or 2005,<span class=3D"Apple-converted-space">=
&nbsp;</span><a href=3D"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Unicode" title=3D"Uni=
code" style=3D"text-decoration: none; color: #0b0080; background: none;" ta=
rget=3D"_blank">Unicode</a><span class=3D"Apple-converted-space">&nbsp;</sp=
an>gained ground and eventually in December 2007 surpassed both<span class=
=3D"Apple-converted-space">&nbsp;</span><a href=3D"https://en.wikipedia.org=
/wiki/ASCII" title=3D"ASCII" style=3D"text-decoration: none; color: #0b0080=
; background: none;" target=3D"_blank">ASCII</a><span class=3D"Apple-conver=
ted-space">&nbsp;</span>and Western European as the Web's most frequently u=
sed<span class=3D"Apple-converted-space">&nbsp;</span><a href=3D"https://en=
.wikipedia.org/wiki/Character_encoding" title=3D"Character encoding" style=
=3D"text-decoration: none; color: #0b0080; background: none;" target=3D"_bl=
ank">character encoding</a>.<sup id=3D"cite_ref-65" class=3D"reference" sty=
le=3D"line-height: 1; unicode-bidi: isolate; font-size: 11.2px; font-weight=
: normal; font-style: normal;"><a href=3D"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wor=
ld_Wide_Web#cite_note-65" style=3D"text-decoration: none; color: #0b0080; w=
hite-space: nowrap; background: none;" target=3D"_blank"><span>[</span>65<s=
pan>]</span></a></sup><span class=3D"Apple-converted-space">&nbsp;</span>Or=
iginally<span class=3D"Apple-converted-space">&nbsp;</span><a class=3D"exte=
rnal mw-magiclink-rfc" rel=3D"nofollow" href=3D"https://tools.ietf.org/html=
/rfc3986" style=3D"text-decoration: none; color: #663366; padding-right: 13=
px; background:  100% 50% no-repeat,  100% 50%;" target=3D"_blank">RFC 3986=
</a><span class=3D"Apple-converted-space">&nbsp;</span>allowed resources to=
 be identified by<span class=3D"Apple-converted-space">&nbsp;</span><a href=
=3D"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/URI" title=3D"URI" class=3D"mw-redirect" =
style=3D"text-decoration: none; color: #0b0080; background: none;" target=
=3D"_blank">URI</a><span class=3D"Apple-converted-space">&nbsp;</span>in a =
subset of US-ASCII.<span class=3D"Apple-converted-space">&nbsp;</span><a cl=
ass=3D"external mw-magiclink-rfc" rel=3D"nofollow" href=3D"https://tools.ie=
tf.org/html/rfc3987" style=3D"text-decoration: none; color: #663366; paddin=
g-right: 13px; background:  100% 50% no-repeat,  100% 50%;" target=3D"_blan=
k">RFC 3987</a><span class=3D"Apple-converted-space">&nbsp;</span>allows mo=
re characters=E2=80=94any character in the<span class=3D"Apple-converted-sp=
ace">&nbsp;</span><a href=3D"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Universal_Charac=
ter_Set" title=3D"Universal Character Set" class=3D"mw-redirect" style=3D"t=
ext-decoration: none; color: #0b0080; background: none;" target=3D"_blank">=
Universal Character Set</a>=E2=80=94and now a resource can be identified by=
<span class=3D"Apple-converted-space">&nbsp;</span><a href=3D"https://en.wi=
kipedia.org/wiki/Internationalized_Resource_Identifier" title=3D"Internatio=
nalized Resource Identifier" class=3D"mw-redirect" style=3D"text-decoration=
: none; color: #0b0080; background: none;" target=3D"_blank">IRI</a><span c=
lass=3D"Apple-converted-space">&nbsp;</span>in any language.<sup id=3D"cite=
_ref-66" class=3D"reference" style=3D"line-height: 1; unicode-bidi: isolate=
; font-size: 11.2px; font-weight: normal; font-style: normal;"><a href=3D"h=
ttps://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/World_Wide_Web#cite_note-66" style=3D"text-dec=
oration: none; color: #0b0080; white-space: nowrap; background: none;" targ=
et=3D"_blank"><span>[</span>66<span>]</span></a></sup><br data-mce-bogus=3D=
"1"></p><h2 style=3D"color: black; font-weight: normal; margin: 1em 0px 0.2=
5em; overflow: hidden; padding: 0px; border-bottom-width: 1px; border-botto=
m-style: solid; border-bottom-color: #aaaaaa; font-size: 1.5em; font-family=
: 'Linux Libertine', Georgia, Times, serif; line-height: 1.3; background: n=
one;"><span class=3D"mw-headline" id=3D"Statistics">Statistics</span><span =
class=3D"mw-editsection" style=3D"-webkit-user-select: none; font-size: sma=
ll; font-weight: normal; margin-left: 1em; vertical-align: baseline; line-h=
eight: 1em; display: inline-block; white-space: nowrap; unicode-bidi: isola=
te; font-family: sans-serif;"><span class=3D"mw-editsection-bracket" style=
=3D"margin-right: 0.25em; color: #555555;">[</span><a href=3D"https://en.wi=
kipedia.org/w/index.php?title=3DWorld_Wide_Web&amp;action=3Dedit&amp;sectio=
n=3D12" title=3D"Edit section: Statistics" style=3D"text-decoration: none; =
color: #0b0080; background: none;" target=3D"_blank">edit</a><span class=3D=
"mw-editsection-bracket" style=3D"margin-left: 0.25em; color: #555555;">]</=
span></span></h2><p style=3D"margin: 0px; line-height: inherit;">Between 20=
05 and 2010, the number of web users doubled, and was expected to surpass t=
wo billion in 2010.<sup id=3D"cite_ref-67" class=3D"reference" style=3D"lin=
e-height: 1; unicode-bidi: isolate; font-size: 11.2px; font-weight: normal;=
 font-style: normal;"><a href=3D"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/World_Wide_W=
eb#cite_note-67" style=3D"text-decoration: none; color: #0b0080; white-spac=
e: nowrap; background: none;" target=3D"_blank"><span>[</span>67<span>]</sp=
an></a></sup><span class=3D"Apple-converted-space">&nbsp;</span>Early studi=
es in 1998 and 1999 estimating the size of the Web using capture/recapture =
methods showed that much of the web was not indexed by search engines and t=
he Web was much larger than expected.<sup id=3D"cite_ref-68" class=3D"refer=
ence" style=3D"line-height: 1; unicode-bidi: isolate; font-size: 11.2px; fo=
nt-weight: normal; font-style: normal;"><a href=3D"https://en.wikipedia.org=
/wiki/World_Wide_Web#cite_note-68" style=3D"text-decoration: none; color: #=
0b0080; white-space: nowrap; background: none;" target=3D"_blank"><span>[</=
span>68<span>]</span></a></sup><sup id=3D"cite_ref-69" class=3D"reference" =
style=3D"line-height: 1; unicode-bidi: isolate; font-size: 11.2px; font-wei=
ght: normal; font-style: normal;"><a href=3D"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/=
World_Wide_Web#cite_note-69" style=3D"text-decoration: none; color: #0b0080=
; white-space: nowrap; background: none;" target=3D"_blank"><span>[</span>6=
9<span>]</span></a></sup><span class=3D"Apple-converted-space">&nbsp;</span=
>According to a 2001 study, there was a massive number, over 550 billion, o=
f documents on the Web, mostly in the invisible Web, or<span class=3D"Apple=
-converted-space">&nbsp;</span><a href=3D"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dee=
p_Web_(search_indexing)" title=3D"Deep Web (search indexing)" class=3D"mw-r=
edirect" style=3D"text-decoration: none; color: #0b0080; background: none;"=
 target=3D"_blank">Deep Web</a>.<sup id=3D"cite_ref-70" class=3D"reference"=
 style=3D"line-height: 1; unicode-bidi: isolate; font-size: 11.2px; font-we=
ight: normal; font-style: normal;"><a href=3D"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki=
/World_Wide_Web#cite_note-70" style=3D"text-decoration: none; color: #0b008=
0; white-space: nowrap; background: none;" target=3D"_blank"><span>[</span>=
70<span>]</span></a></sup><span class=3D"Apple-converted-space">&nbsp;</spa=
n>A 2002 survey of 2,024 million web pages<sup id=3D"cite_ref-71" class=3D"=
reference" style=3D"line-height: 1; unicode-bidi: isolate; font-size: 11.2p=
x; font-weight: normal; font-style: normal;"><a href=3D"https://en.wikipedi=
a.org/wiki/World_Wide_Web#cite_note-71" style=3D"text-decoration: none; col=
or: #0b0080; white-space: nowrap; background: none;" target=3D"_blank"><spa=
n>[</span>71<span>]</span></a></sup><span class=3D"Apple-converted-space">&=
nbsp;</span>determined that by far the most web content was in the English =
language: 56.4%; next were pages in German (7.7%), French (5.6%), and Japan=
ese (4.9%). A more recent study, which used web searches in 75 different la=
nguages to sample the Web, determined that there were over 11.5 billion web=
 pages in the<span class=3D"Apple-converted-space">&nbsp;</span><a href=3D"=
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Surface_Web" title=3D"Surface Web" class=3D"m=
w-redirect" style=3D"text-decoration: none; color: #0b0080; background: non=
e;" target=3D"_blank">publicly indexable web</a><span class=3D"Apple-conver=
ted-space">&nbsp;</span>as of the end of January 2005.<sup id=3D"cite_ref-7=
2" class=3D"reference" style=3D"line-height: 1; unicode-bidi: isolate; font=
-size: 11.2px; font-weight: normal; font-style: normal;"><a href=3D"https:/=
/en.wikipedia.org/wiki/World_Wide_Web#cite_note-72" style=3D"text-decoratio=
n: none; color: #0b0080; white-space: nowrap; background: none;" target=3D"=
_blank"><span>[</span>72<span>]</span></a></sup><span class=3D"Apple-conver=
ted-space">&nbsp;</span>As of March 2009, the indexable web contains at lea=
st 25.21 billion pages.<sup id=3D"cite_ref-73" class=3D"reference" style=3D=
"line-height: 1; unicode-bidi: isolate; font-size: 11.2px; font-weight: nor=
mal; font-style: normal;"><a href=3D"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/World_Wi=
de_Web#cite_note-73" style=3D"text-decoration: none; color: #0b0080; white-=
space: nowrap; background: none;" target=3D"_blank"><span>[</span>73<span>]=
</span></a></sup><span class=3D"Apple-converted-space">&nbsp;</span>On 25 J=
uly 2008, Google software engineers Jesse Alpert and Nissan Hajaj announced=
 that<a href=3D"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Google_Search" title=3D"Googl=
e Search" style=3D"text-decoration: none; color: #0b0080; background: none;=
" target=3D"_blank">Google Search</a><span class=3D"Apple-converted-space">=
&nbsp;</span>had discovered one trillion unique URLs.<sup id=3D"cite_ref-74=
" class=3D"reference" style=3D"line-height: 1; unicode-bidi: isolate; font-=
size: 11.2px; font-weight: normal; font-style: normal;"><a href=3D"https://=
en.wikipedia.org/wiki/World_Wide_Web#cite_note-74" style=3D"text-decoration=
: none; color: #0b0080; white-space: nowrap; background: none;" target=3D"_=
blank"><span>[</span>74<span>]</span></a></sup><span class=3D"Apple-convert=
ed-space">&nbsp;</span>As of May 2009, over 109.5 million domains operated.=
<sup id=3D"cite_ref-NI_75-0" class=3D"reference" style=3D"line-height: 1; u=
nicode-bidi: isolate; font-size: 11.2px; font-weight: normal; font-style: n=
ormal;"><a href=3D"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/World_Wide_Web#cite_note-N=
I-75" style=3D"text-decoration: none; color: #0b0080; white-space: nowrap; =
background: none;" target=3D"_blank"><span>[</span>75<span>]</span></a></su=
p><sup class=3D"noprint Inline-Template" style=3D"line-height: 1; font-size=
: 11.2px; white-space: nowrap;">[<i><a href=3D"https://en.wikipedia.org/wik=
i/Wikipedia:Verifiability" title=3D"Wikipedia:Verifiability" style=3D"text-=
decoration: none; color: #0b0080; background: none;" target=3D"_blank"><spa=
n title=3D"The material near this tag failed verification of its source cit=
ation(s). (November 2011)">not in citation given</span></a></i>]</sup><span=
 class=3D"Apple-converted-space">&nbsp;</span>Of these, 74% were commercial=
 or other domains operating in the<span class=3D"Apple-converted-space">&nb=
sp;</span><a href=3D"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Generic_top-level_domain=
" title=3D"Generic top-level domain" style=3D"text-decoration: none; color:=
 #0b0080; background: none;" target=3D"_blank">generic top-level domain</a>=
<span class=3D"Apple-converted-space">&nbsp;</span><i>com</i>.<sup id=3D"ci=
te_ref-NI_75-1" class=3D"reference" style=3D"line-height: 1; unicode-bidi: =
isolate; font-size: 11.2px; font-weight: normal; font-style: normal;"><a hr=
ef=3D"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/World_Wide_Web#cite_note-NI-75" style=
=3D"text-decoration: none; color: #0b0080; white-space: nowrap; background:=
 none;" target=3D"_blank"><span>[</span>75<span>]</span></a></sup><br data-=
mce-bogus=3D"1"></p><p style=3D"margin: 0px; line-height: inherit;">Statist=
ics measuring a website's popularity are usually based either on the number=
 of<span class=3D"Apple-converted-space">&nbsp;</span><a href=3D"https://en=
.wikipedia.org/wiki/Page_view" title=3D"Page view" style=3D"text-decoration=
: none; color: #0b0080; background: none;" target=3D"_blank">page views</a>=
<span class=3D"Apple-converted-space">&nbsp;</span>or on associated server =
'<a href=3D"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hit_(internet)" title=3D"Hit (int=
ernet)" class=3D"mw-redirect" style=3D"text-decoration: none; color: #0b008=
0; background: none;" target=3D"_blank">hits</a>' (file requests) that it r=
eceives.</p><h2 style=3D"color: black; font-weight: normal; margin: 1em 0px=
 0.25em; overflow: hidden; padding: 0px; border-bottom-width: 1px; border-b=
ottom-style: solid; border-bottom-color: #aaaaaa; font-size: 1.5em; font-fa=
mily: 'Linux Libertine', Georgia, Times, serif; line-height: 1.3; backgroun=
d: none;"><span class=3D"mw-headline" id=3D"Speed_issues">Speed issues</spa=
n><span class=3D"mw-editsection" style=3D"-webkit-user-select: none; font-s=
ize: small; font-weight: normal; margin-left: 1em; vertical-align: baseline=
; line-height: 1em; display: inline-block; white-space: nowrap; unicode-bid=
i: isolate; font-family: sans-serif;"><span class=3D"mw-editsection-bracket=
" style=3D"margin-right: 0.25em; color: #555555;">[</span><a href=3D"https:=
//en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=3DWorld_Wide_Web&amp;action=3Dedit&amp=
;section=3D13" title=3D"Edit section: Speed issues" style=3D"text-decoratio=
n: none; color: #0b0080; background: none;" target=3D"_blank">edit</a><span=
 class=3D"mw-editsection-bracket" style=3D"margin-left: 0.25em; color: #555=
555;">]</span></span></h2><p style=3D"margin: 0px; line-height: inherit;">F=
rustration over<span class=3D"Apple-converted-space">&nbsp;</span><a href=
=3D"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Network_congestion" title=3D"Network cong=
estion" style=3D"text-decoration: none; color: #0b0080; background: none;" =
target=3D"_blank">congestion</a><span class=3D"Apple-converted-space">&nbsp=
;</span>issues in the Internet infrastructure and the high<span class=3D"Ap=
ple-converted-space">&nbsp;</span><a href=3D"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/=
Latency_(engineering)" title=3D"Latency (engineering)" style=3D"text-decora=
tion: none; color: #0b0080; background: none;" target=3D"_blank">latency</a=
><span class=3D"Apple-converted-space">&nbsp;</span>that results in slow br=
owsing has led to a pejorative name for the World Wide Web: the<span class=
=3D"Apple-converted-space">&nbsp;</span><i>World Wide Wait</i>.<sup id=3D"c=
ite_ref-76" class=3D"reference" style=3D"line-height: 1; unicode-bidi: isol=
ate; font-size: 11.2px; font-weight: normal; font-style: normal;"><a href=
=3D"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/World_Wide_Web#cite_note-76" style=3D"tex=
t-decoration: none; color: #0b0080; white-space: nowrap; background: none;"=
 target=3D"_blank"><span>[</span>76<span>]</span></a></sup><span class=3D"A=
pple-converted-space">&nbsp;</span>Speeding up the Internet is an ongoing d=
iscussion over the use of<span class=3D"Apple-converted-space">&nbsp;</span=
><a href=3D"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Peering" title=3D"Peering" style=
=3D"text-decoration: none; color: #0b0080; background: none;" target=3D"_bl=
ank">peering</a><span class=3D"Apple-converted-space">&nbsp;</span>and<span=
 class=3D"Apple-converted-space">&nbsp;</span><a href=3D"https://en.wikiped=
ia.org/wiki/Quality_of_service" title=3D"Quality of service" style=3D"text-=
decoration: none; color: #0b0080; background: none;" target=3D"_blank">QoS<=
/a><span class=3D"Apple-converted-space">&nbsp;</span>technologies. Other s=
olutions to reduce the congestion can be found at<span class=3D"Apple-conve=
rted-space">&nbsp;</span><a href=3D"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/W3C" titl=
e=3D"W3C" class=3D"mw-redirect" style=3D"text-decoration: none; color: #0b0=
080; background: none;" target=3D"_blank">W3C</a>.<sup id=3D"cite_ref-77" c=
lass=3D"reference" style=3D"line-height: 1; unicode-bidi: isolate; font-siz=
e: 11.2px; font-weight: normal; font-style: normal;"><a href=3D"https://en.=
wikipedia.org/wiki/World_Wide_Web#cite_note-77" style=3D"text-decoration: n=
one; color: #0b0080; white-space: nowrap; background: none;" target=3D"_bla=
nk"><span>[</span>77<span>]</span></a></sup><span class=3D"Apple-converted-=
space">&nbsp;</span><a href=3D"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Guideline" tit=
le=3D"Guideline" style=3D"text-decoration: none; color: #0b0080; background=
: none;" target=3D"_blank">Guidelines</a><span class=3D"Apple-converted-spa=
ce">&nbsp;</span>for web response times are:<sup id=3D"cite_ref-78" class=
=3D"reference" style=3D"line-height: 1; unicode-bidi: isolate; font-size: 1=
1.2px; font-weight: normal; font-style: normal;"><a href=3D"https://en.wiki=
pedia.org/wiki/World_Wide_Web#cite_note-78" style=3D"text-decoration: none;=
 color: #0b0080; white-space: nowrap; background: none;" target=3D"_blank">=
<span>[</span>78<span>]</span></a></sup><br data-mce-bogus=3D"1"></p><ul st=
yle=3D"list-style-type: disc; margin: 0.3em 0px 0px 1.6em; padding: 0px;"><=
li style=3D"margin-bottom: 0.1em;">0.1 second (one tenth of a second). Idea=
l response time. The user does not sense any interruption.</li><li style=3D=
"margin-bottom: 0.1em;">1 second. Highest acceptable response time. Downloa=
d times above 1 second interrupt the user experience.</li><li style=3D"marg=
in-bottom: 0.1em;">10 seconds. Unacceptable response time. The user experie=
nce is interrupted and the user is likely to leave the site or system.</li>=
</ul><h2 style=3D"color: black; font-weight: normal; margin: 1em 0px 0.25em=
; overflow: hidden; padding: 0px; border-bottom-width: 1px; border-bottom-s=
tyle: solid; border-bottom-color: #aaaaaa; font-size: 1.5em; font-family: '=
Linux Libertine', Georgia, Times, serif; line-height: 1.3; background: none=
;"><span class=3D"mw-headline" id=3D"Web_caching">Web caching</span><span c=
lass=3D"mw-editsection" style=3D"-webkit-user-select: none; font-size: smal=
l; font-weight: normal; margin-left: 1em; vertical-align: baseline; line-he=
ight: 1em; display: inline-block; white-space: nowrap; unicode-bidi: isolat=
e; font-family: sans-serif;"><span class=3D"mw-editsection-bracket" style=
=3D"margin-right: 0.25em; color: #555555;">[</span><a href=3D"https://en.wi=
kipedia.org/w/index.php?title=3DWorld_Wide_Web&amp;action=3Dedit&amp;sectio=
n=3D14" title=3D"Edit section: Web caching" style=3D"text-decoration: none;=
 color: #0b0080; background: none;" target=3D"_blank">edit</a><span class=
=3D"mw-editsection-bracket" style=3D"margin-left: 0.25em; color: #555555;">=
]</span></span></h2><p style=3D"margin: 0px; line-height: inherit;">A<span =
class=3D"Apple-converted-space">&nbsp;</span><a href=3D"https://en.wikipedi=
a.org/wiki/Web_cache" title=3D"Web cache" style=3D"text-decoration: none; c=
olor: #0b0080; background: none;" target=3D"_blank">web cache</a><span clas=
s=3D"Apple-converted-space">&nbsp;</span>is a server computer located eithe=
r on the public Internet, or within an enterprise that stores recently acce=
ssed web pages to improve response time for users when the same content is =
requested within a certain time after the original request.</p><p style=3D"=
margin: 0px; line-height: inherit;">Most web browsers also implement a<span=
 class=3D"Apple-converted-space">&nbsp;</span><a href=3D"https://en.wikiped=
ia.org/wiki/Browser_cache" title=3D"Browser cache" class=3D"mw-redirect" st=
yle=3D"text-decoration: none; color: #0b0080; background: none;" target=3D"=
_blank">browser cache</a><span class=3D"Apple-converted-space">&nbsp;</span=
>for recently obtained data, usually on the local disk drive. HTTP requests=
 by a browser may ask only for data that has changed since the last access.=
 Web pages and resources may contain expiration information to control cach=
ing to secure sensitive data, such as in<span class=3D"Apple-converted-spac=
e">&nbsp;</span><a href=3D"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Online_banking" ti=
tle=3D"Online banking" style=3D"text-decoration: none; color: #0b0080; back=
ground: none;" target=3D"_blank">online banking</a>, or to facilitate frequ=
ently updated sites, such as news media. Even sites with highly dynamic con=
tent may permit basic resources to be refreshed only occasionally. Web site=
 designers find it worthwhile to collate resources such as CSS data and Jav=
aScript into a few site-wide files so that they can be cached efficiently.<=
/p><p style=3D"margin: 0px; line-height: inherit;">Enterprise<span class=3D=
"Apple-converted-space">&nbsp;</span><a href=3D"https://en.wikipedia.org/wi=
ki/Firewall_(networking)" title=3D"Firewall (networking)" class=3D"mw-redir=
ect" style=3D"text-decoration: none; color: #0b0080; background: none;" tar=
get=3D"_blank">firewalls</a><span class=3D"Apple-converted-space">&nbsp;</s=
pan>often cache Web resources requested by one user for the benefit of many=
. Some<span class=3D"Apple-converted-space">&nbsp;</span><a href=3D"https:/=
/en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Search_engines" title=3D"Search engines" class=3D"mw=
-redirect" style=3D"text-decoration: none; color: #0b0080; background: none=
;" target=3D"_blank">search engines</a><span class=3D"Apple-converted-space=
">&nbsp;</span>store cached content of frequently accessed websites.</p><h2=
 style=3D"color: black; font-weight: normal; margin: 1em 0px 0.25em; overfl=
ow: hidden; padding: 0px; border-bottom-width: 1px; border-bottom-style: so=
lid; border-bottom-color: #aaaaaa; font-size: 1.5em; font-family: 'Linux Li=
bertine', Georgia, Times, serif; line-height: 1.3; background: none;"><span=
 class=3D"mw-headline" id=3D"See_also">See also</span><span class=3D"mw-edi=
tsection" style=3D"-webkit-user-select: none; font-size: small; font-weight=
: normal; margin-left: 1em; vertical-align: baseline; line-height: 1em; dis=
play: inline-block; white-space: nowrap; unicode-bidi: isolate; font-family=
: sans-serif;"><span class=3D"mw-editsection-bracket" style=3D"margin-right=
: 0.25em; color: #555555;">[</span><a href=3D"https://en.wikipedia.org/w/in=
dex.php?title=3DWorld_Wide_Web&amp;action=3Dedit&amp;section=3D15" title=3D=
"Edit section: See also" style=3D"text-decoration: none; color: #0b0080; ba=
ckground: none;" target=3D"_blank">edit</a><span class=3D"mw-editsection-br=
acket" style=3D"margin-left: 0.25em; color: #555555;">]</span></span></h2><=

orphans: auto; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; w=

><div id=3D"centralNotice"><br></div></div><div class=3D"mw-indicators" sty=
le=3D"float: right; line-height: 1.6; font-size: 0.875em; position: relativ=
e; z-index: 1; padding-top: 0.4em;"><br></div><h1 id=3D"firstHeading" class=
=3D"firstHeading" style=3D"color: black; font-weight: normal; margin: 0px 0=
px 0.25em; overflow: visible; padding: 0px; border-bottom-width: 1px; borde=
r-bottom-style: solid; border-bottom-color: #aaaaaa; font-size: 1.8em; line=
-height: 1.3; font-family: 'Linux Libertine', Georgia, Times, serif; backgr=
ound: none;" lang=3D"en">World Wide Web</h1><div id=3D"bodyContent" class=
=3D"mw-body-content" style=3D"position: relative; line-height: 1.6; font-si=
ze: 0.875em; z-index: 0;"><div id=3D"siteSub" style=3D"display: block; font=
-size: 12.88px;">From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia</div><div id=3D"cont=
entSub" style=3D"font-size: 11.76px; line-height: 1.2em; margin: 0px 0px 1.=
4em 1em; color: #545454; width: auto;"><br></div><div id=3D"jump-to-nav" cl=
ass=3D"mw-jump" style=3D"overflow: hidden; height: 0px; zoom: 1; -webkit-us=
er-select: none; margin-top: -1.4em; margin-bottom: 1.4em;"><a href=3D"http=
s://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/World_Wide_Web#mw-head" style=3D"text-decoration:=
 none; color: #0b0080; background: none;" target=3D"_blank"></a><a href=3D"=
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/World_Wide_Web#p-search" style=3D"text-decora=
tion: none; color: #0b0080; background: none;" target=3D"_blank"></a><br></=
div><div id=3D"mw-content-text" dir=3D"ltr" class=3D"mw-content-ltr" style=
=3D"direction: ltr;" lang=3D"en"><div class=3D"hatnote" style=3D"font-style=
: italic; padding-left: 1.6em; margin-bottom: 0.5em;">"WWW" and "The web" r=
edirect here. For other uses of WWW, see<span class=3D"Apple-converted-spac=
e">&nbsp;</span><a href=3D"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/WWW_(disambiguatio=
n)" title=3D"WWW (disambiguation)" class=3D"mw-disambig" style=3D"text-deco=
ration: none; color: #0b0080; background: none;" target=3D"_blank">WWW (dis=
ambiguation)</a>. For other uses of web, see<span class=3D"Apple-converted-=
space">&nbsp;</span><a href=3D"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Web_(disambigu=
ation)" title=3D"Web (disambiguation)" class=3D"mw-redirect mw-disambig" st=
yle=3D"text-decoration: none; color: #0b0080; background: none;" target=3D"=
_blank">Web (disambiguation)</a>.</div><div class=3D"hatnote" style=3D"font=
-style: italic; padding-left: 1.6em; margin-bottom: 0.5em; margin-top: -0.5=
em;">For the first web software, see<span class=3D"Apple-converted-space">&=
nbsp;</span><a href=3D"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/WorldWideWeb" title=3D=
"WorldWideWeb" style=3D"text-decoration: none; color: #0b0080; background: =
none;" target=3D"_blank">WorldWideWeb</a>.</div><p style=3D"margin: 0px; li=
ne-height: inherit;">The<span class=3D"Apple-converted-space">&nbsp;</span>=
<b>World Wide Web</b><span class=3D"Apple-converted-space">&nbsp;</span>(<b=
>WWW</b>) is an<span class=3D"Apple-converted-space">&nbsp;</span><a href=
=3D"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Open_source" title=3D"Open source" style=
=3D"text-decoration: none; color: #0b0080; background: none;" target=3D"_bl=
ank">open source</a><span class=3D"Apple-converted-space">&nbsp;</span><a h=
ref=3D"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Information_space" title=3D"Informatio=
n space" style=3D"text-decoration: none; color: #0b0080; background: none;"=
 target=3D"_blank">information space</a><span class=3D"Apple-converted-spac=
e">&nbsp;</span>where documents and other<span class=3D"Apple-converted-spa=
ce">&nbsp;</span><a href=3D"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Web_resource" tit=
le=3D"Web resource" style=3D"text-decoration: none; color: #0b0080; backgro=
und: none;" target=3D"_blank">web resources</a><span class=3D"Apple-convert=
ed-space">&nbsp;</span>are identified by<span class=3D"Apple-converted-spac=
e">&nbsp;</span><a href=3D"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/URL" title=3D"URL"=
 class=3D"mw-redirect" style=3D"text-decoration: none; color: #0b0080; back=
ground: none;" target=3D"_blank">URLs</a>, interlinked by<span class=3D"App=
le-converted-space">&nbsp;</span><a href=3D"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/H=
ypertext" title=3D"Hypertext" style=3D"text-decoration: none; color: #0b008=
0; background: none;" target=3D"_blank">hypertext</a><span class=3D"Apple-c=
onverted-space">&nbsp;</span>links, and can be accessed via the<span class=
=3D"Apple-converted-space">&nbsp;</span><a href=3D"https://en.wikipedia.org=
/wiki/Internet" title=3D"Internet" style=3D"text-decoration: none; color: #=
0b0080; background: none;" target=3D"_blank">Internet</a>.<sup id=3D"cite_r=
ef-1" class=3D"reference" style=3D"line-height: 1; unicode-bidi: isolate; f=
ont-size: 11.2px; font-weight: normal; font-style: normal;"><a href=3D"http=
s://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/World_Wide_Web#cite_note-1" style=3D"text-decorat=
ion: none; color: #0b0080; white-space: nowrap; background: none;" target=
=3D"_blank"><span>[</span>1<span>]</span></a></sup><span class=3D"Apple-con=
verted-space">&nbsp;</span>The World Wide Web was invented by English scien=
tist<span class=3D"Apple-converted-space">&nbsp;</span><a href=3D"https://e=
n.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tim_Berners-Lee" title=3D"Tim Berners-Lee" style=3D"te=
xt-decoration: none; color: #0b0080; background: none;" target=3D"_blank">T=
im Berners-Lee</a><span class=3D"Apple-converted-space">&nbsp;</span>in 198=
9. He wrote the first web browser in 1990 while employed at<span class=3D"A=
pple-converted-space">&nbsp;</span><a href=3D"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki=
/CERN" title=3D"CERN" style=3D"text-decoration: none; color: #0b0080; backg=
round: none;" target=3D"_blank">CERN</a><span class=3D"Apple-converted-spac=
e">&nbsp;</span>in Switzerland.<sup id=3D"cite_ref-2" class=3D"reference" s=
tyle=3D"line-height: 1; unicode-bidi: isolate; font-size: 11.2px; font-weig=
ht: normal; font-style: normal;"><a href=3D"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/W=
orld_Wide_Web#cite_note-2" style=3D"text-decoration: none; color: #0b0080; =
white-space: nowrap; background: none;" target=3D"_blank"><span>[</span>2<s=
pan>]</span></a></sup><sup id=3D"cite_ref-AHT_3-0" class=3D"reference" styl=
e=3D"line-height: 1; unicode-bidi: isolate; font-size: 11.2px; font-weight:=
 normal; font-style: normal;"><a href=3D"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Worl=
d_Wide_Web#cite_note-AHT-3" style=3D"text-decoration: none; color: #0b0080;=
 white-space: nowrap; background: none;" target=3D"_blank"><span>[</span>3<=
span>]</span></a></sup><br data-mce-bogus=3D"1"></p><p style=3D"margin: 0px=
; line-height: inherit;">It has become known simply as<span class=3D"Apple-=
converted-space">&nbsp;</span><b>the Web</b>. The World Wide Web was centra=
l to the development of the<span class=3D"Apple-converted-space">&nbsp;</sp=
an><a href=3D"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Information_Age" title=3D"Infor=
mation Age" style=3D"text-decoration: none; color: #0b0080; background: non=
e;" target=3D"_blank">Information Age</a><span class=3D"Apple-converted-spa=
ce">&nbsp;</span>and is the primary tool billions of people use to interact=
 on the Internet.<sup id=3D"cite_ref-4" class=3D"reference" style=3D"line-h=
eight: 1; unicode-bidi: isolate; font-size: 11.2px; font-weight: normal; fo=
nt-style: normal;"><a href=3D"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/World_Wide_Web#=
cite_note-4" style=3D"text-decoration: none; color: #0b0080; white-space: n=
owrap; background: none;" target=3D"_blank"><span>[</span>4<span>]</span></=
a></sup><sup id=3D"cite_ref-5" class=3D"reference" style=3D"line-height: 1;=
 unicode-bidi: isolate; font-size: 11.2px; font-weight: normal; font-style:=
 normal;"><a href=3D"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/World_Wide_Web#cite_note=
-5" style=3D"text-decoration: none; color: #0b0080; white-space: nowrap; ba=
ckground: none;" target=3D"_blank"><span>[</span>5<span>]</span></a></sup><=
sup id=3D"cite_ref-6" class=3D"reference" style=3D"line-height: 1; unicode-=
bidi: isolate; font-size: 11.2px; font-weight: normal; font-style: normal;"=
><a href=3D"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/World_Wide_Web#cite_note-6" style=
=3D"text-decoration: none; color: #0b0080; white-space: nowrap; background:=
 none;" target=3D"_blank"><span>[</span>6<span>]</span></a></sup><br data-m=
ce-bogus=3D"1"></p><p style=3D"margin: 0px; line-height: inherit;"><a href=
=3D"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Web_page" title=3D"Web page" style=3D"tex=
t-decoration: none; color: #0b0080; background: none;" target=3D"_blank">We=
b pages</a><span class=3D"Apple-converted-space">&nbsp;</span>are primarily=
<span class=3D"Apple-converted-space">&nbsp;</span><a href=3D"https://en.wi=
kipedia.org/wiki/Plain_text" title=3D"Plain text" style=3D"text-decoration:=
 none; color: #0b0080; background: none;" target=3D"_blank">text</a><span c=
lass=3D"Apple-converted-space">&nbsp;</span>documents formatted and annotat=
ed with<span class=3D"Apple-converted-space">&nbsp;</span><a href=3D"https:=
//en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hypertext_Markup_Language" title=3D"Hypertext Marku=
p Language" class=3D"mw-redirect" style=3D"text-decoration: none; color: #0=
b0080; background: none;" target=3D"_blank">Hypertext Markup Language</a><s=
pan class=3D"Apple-converted-space">&nbsp;</span>(HTML). In addition to for=
matted text, web pages may contain<span class=3D"Apple-converted-space">&nb=
sp;</span><a href=3D"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Image" title=3D"Image" s=
tyle=3D"text-decoration: none; color: #0b0080; background: none;" target=3D=
"_blank">images</a>,<span class=3D"Apple-converted-space">&nbsp;</span><a h=
ref=3D"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Video" title=3D"Video" style=3D"text-d=
ecoration: none; color: #0b0080; background: none;" target=3D"_blank">video=
</a>, and software components that are rendered in the user's<span class=3D=
"Apple-converted-space">&nbsp;</span><a href=3D"https://en.wikipedia.org/wi=
ki/Web_browser" title=3D"Web browser" style=3D"text-decoration: none; color=
: #0b0080; background: none;" target=3D"_blank">web browser</a><span class=
=3D"Apple-converted-space">&nbsp;</span>as coherent pages of<span class=3D"=
Apple-converted-space">&nbsp;</span><a href=3D"https://en.wikipedia.org/wik=
i/Multimedia" title=3D"Multimedia" style=3D"text-decoration: none; color: #=
0b0080; background: none;" target=3D"_blank">multimedia</a><span class=3D"A=
pple-converted-space">&nbsp;</span>content. Embedded<span class=3D"Apple-co=
nverted-space">&nbsp;</span><a href=3D"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hyperl=
ink" title=3D"Hyperlink" style=3D"text-decoration: none; color: #0b0080; ba=
ckground: none;" target=3D"_blank">hyperlinks</a><span class=3D"Apple-conve=
rted-space">&nbsp;</span>permit users to<span class=3D"Apple-converted-spac=
e">&nbsp;</span><a href=3D"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Web_navigation" ti=
tle=3D"Web navigation" style=3D"text-decoration: none; color: #0b0080; back=
ground: none;" target=3D"_blank">navigate</a><span class=3D"Apple-converted=
-space">&nbsp;</span>between web pages. Multiple web pages with a common th=
eme, a common<span class=3D"Apple-converted-space">&nbsp;</span><a href=3D"=
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Domain_name" title=3D"Domain name" style=3D"t=
ext-decoration: none; color: #0b0080; background: none;" target=3D"_blank">=
domain name</a>, or both, may be called a<span class=3D"Apple-converted-spa=
ce">&nbsp;</span><i><a href=3D"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Website" title=
=3D"Website" style=3D"text-decoration: none; color: #0b0080; background: no=
ne;" target=3D"_blank">website</a></i>. Website content can largely be prov=
ided by the publisher, or interactive where users contribute content or the=
 content depends upon the user or their actions. Websites may be mostly inf=
ormative, primarily for entertainment, or largely for commercial purposes.<=
/p><p style=3D"margin: 0px; line-height: inherit;"><br></p><div id=3D"toc" =
class=3D"toc" style=3D"border: 1px solid #aaaaaa; padding: 7px; font-size: =
13.3px; display: table; zoom: 1; background-color: #f9f9f9;"><div id=3D"toc=
title" style=3D"direction: ltr; text-align: center;"><h2 style=3D"color: bl=
ack; font-weight: bold; margin: 1em 0px 0.25em; overflow: hidden; padding: =
0px; border: none; font-size: 13.3px; display: inline; font-family: sans-se=
rif; line-height: 1.3; background: none;">Contents</h2><span class=3D"Apple=

><ul style=3D"list-style-type: none; margin: 0px 0px 0px 2em; padding: 0px;=

n></a><br data-mce-bogus=3D"1"></li><li class=3D"toclevel-2 tocsection-4" s=

>Dynamic updates of web pages</span></a><br data-mce-bogus=3D"1"></li><li c=

>2.3</span><span class=3D"toctext" style=3D"display: table-cell; text-decor=

ss=3D"toclevel-2 tocsection-6" style=3D"margin-bottom: 0.1em;"><a href=3D"h=
ttps://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/World_Wide_Web#Scheme_specifiers" style=3D"tex=
t-decoration: none; color: #0b0080; background: none;" target=3D"_blank"><s=
pan class=3D"tocnumber" style=3D"display: table-cell; text-decoration: inhe=
rit;">2.4</span><span class=3D"toctext" style=3D"display: table-cell; text-=
decoration: inherit;">Scheme specifiers</span></a><br data-mce-bogus=3D"1">=
</li></ul></li><li class=3D"toclevel-1 tocsection-7" style=3D"margin-bottom=
: 0.1em;"><a href=3D"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/World_Wide_Web#Web_secur=
ity" style=3D"text-decoration: none; color: #0b0080; background: none;" tar=
get=3D"_blank"><span class=3D"tocnumber" style=3D"display: table-cell; text=

ble-cell; text-decoration: inherit;">Web security</span></a><br data-mce-bo=
gus=3D"1"></li><li class=3D"toclevel-1 tocsection-8" style=3D"margin-bottom=

style=3D"text-decoration: none; color: #0b0080; background: none;" target=

coration: inherit;">4</span><span class=3D"toctext" style=3D"display: table=

"></li><li class=3D"toclevel-1 tocsection-9" style=3D"margin-bottom: 0.1em;=

b_caching" style=3D"text-decoration: none; color: #0b0080; background: none=

lay: table-cell; text-decoration: inherit;">Web caching</span></a><br data-=

a-mce-bogus=3D"1"></li><li class=3D"toclevel-1 tocsection-17" style=3D"marg=

br data-mce-bogus=3D"1"></li><li class=3D"toclevel-1 tocsection-18" style=
